official.headline: Directorate Announces Transition
official.anchor_line: Authorities confirm the passing of Marek Halden, head of the Central Oversight Directorate.
official.contextual_reframing: Systems remain stable, with seamless continuity ensured by advanced governance protocols.

underground.headline: Halden Found Dead
underground.anchor_line: System architect Marek Halden has died inside Tower 9—no real answers, no public replacement.
underground.contextual_reframing: BCI glitches surge, delays everywhere, and the Council’s silent—don’t believe ‘smooth transition’ talk.
